sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Row, Col, Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import "../styles/footerStyles.css"; import { useAuth } from ".../context/AuthContext"; function Footer() { const { user } = useAuth(); const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); // Modal states const [showAbout, setShowAbout] = useState(false); const [showPrivacy, setShowPrivacy] = useState(false); const [showTerms, setShowTerms] = useState(false); // Feature modal states const [showFeatureModal, setShowFeatureModal] = useState(false); const [featureContent, setFeatureContent] = useState({ title: "", description: "", icon: "", }); // Function to show feature description modal const handleShowFeature = (feature) => { const featureDetails = { "Study Groups": { title: "Study Groups", description: "Create or join study groups based on your courses, interests, or goals. Collaborate with peers, schedule study sessions, and share resources to enhance your learning experience.", icon: "fas fa-users", }, "Event Calendar": { title: "Event Calendar", description: "Keep track of all your study sessions, group meetings, and academic deadlines in one place. Receive reminders and easily manage your schedule to stay organized.", icon: "fas fa-calendar-alt", }, "Group Chat": { title: "Group Chat", description: "Communicate with your study group members in real-time. Share ideas, ask questions, and collaborate effectively with our integrated messaging system.", icon: "fas fa-comments", }, "Resource Sharing": { title: "Resource Sharing", description: "Share notes, documents, links, and other learning materials with your study groups. Access a centralized repository of resources to support your academic journey.", icon: "fas fa-share-alt", }, "Dark Mode": { title: "Dark Mode", description: "Reduce eye strain during late-night study sessions with our sleek dark mode. Toggle between light and dark themes based on your preference or time of day.", icon: "fas fa-moon", }, }; setFeatureContent(featureDetails[feature]); setShowFeatureModal(true); }; return ( <>
{/* NexusEd Description Column */}
NexusEd

Connecting students through collaborative learning. NexusEd is your all-in-one platform for study groups, resource sharing, and academic success. Join thousands of students already learning together.

{/* Connect With Us Section moved here */}
Connect With Us
{/* Social Icons */}
{/* Contact Links */}
  • Contact Us
  • Call Support
{/* Quick Links Section (Navigation Links) */}
Quick Links
  • Home
  • Study Groups
    • {user && ( <>
  • Calendar
  • Profile
    • )} {!user && ( <>
  • Login
  • Register
    • )}
{/* Features Section */}
Features
{/* Support & Info Section */}
Support & Info
  • Contact Support
  • Report Issue
{/* Bottom Bar */}

{currentYear} NexusEd. All rights reserved.

{/* About Modal */} setShowAbout(false)} size="lg" centered > About NexusEd

NexusEd is a collaborative learning platform designed to connect students and facilitate group study. Our mission is to create a vibrant community where students can connect, collaborate, and achieve academic success together.

Study Groups

Join or create study groups based on your interests and subjects.

Event Management

Schedule and manage study sessions, meetings, and events.

Resource Sharing

Share notes, documents, and learning materials with your peers.

Real-time Chat

Communicate with group members through integrated messaging.

{/* Privacy Policy Modal */} setShowPrivacy(false)} size="lg" centered > Privacy Policy

Last updated: {new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

At NexusEd, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our platform.

Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, join study groups, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, and profile information.

How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, facilitate study group connections, and communicate with you about your account and our services.

Information Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy or as required by law.

Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@nexused.com.

{/* Terms of Service Modal */} setShowTerms(false)} size="lg" centered > Terms of Service

Last updated: {new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

Welcome to NexusEd. These Terms of Service govern your use of our platform and services.

Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using NexusEd, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

User Responsibilities

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to use the platform in a respectful and lawful manner.

Content Guidelines

Users must not post content that is offensive, harmful, or violates any laws. We reserve the right to remove content that violates these guidelines.

Intellectual Property

The platform and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by NexusEd and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

Limitation of Liability

NexusEd shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the platform.

Contact Information

For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at{" "} legal@nexused.com.

{/* Feature Detail Modal */} setShowFeatureModal(false)} size="lg" centered > {featureContent.title}

{featureContent.description}

{featureContent.title === "Study Groups" && (
Key Benefits
  • Connect with peers who share your academic interests
  • Schedule regular study sessions to maintain consistency
  • Access shared resources from all group members
  • Ask questions and get help from your study partners
)} {featureContent.title === "Event Calendar" && (
Key Benefits
  • View all your academic events in one organized calendar
  • Set reminders for upcoming deadlines and meetings
  • Color-code events by category for better visualization
  • Sync with your study group schedules automatically
)} {featureContent.title === "Group Chat" && (
Key Benefits
  • Real-time messaging with all your study group members
  • Share files and links directly in the conversation
  • Create topic-specific channels within each group
  • Access chat history to review previous discussions
)} {featureContent.title === "Resource Sharing" && (
Key Benefits
  • Upload and share notes, documents, and study materials
  • Organize resources by subject, topic, or date
  • Comment on shared resources to add context or ask questions
  • Access a centralized library of all materials shared in your groups
)} {featureContent.title === "Dark Mode" && (
Key Benefits
  • Reduce eye strain during long study sessions
  • Save battery life on mobile devices
  • Automatically switch based on system preferences
  • Enjoy a sleek, modern interface that's easy on the eyes
)} ); } export default Footer;
